indiya agramathya shri narendra modi mahatha saha shri lanka agramathya ranil wikramasinha mahatha athara eeye (26) nawadilli nuwara hayidrabad mandiraye di pawathi sakachchawanhi di agramathyawaru depala awadharanaya kale, kalapiya samaya saha aarakshawa saha indiya sagara aachara dharma ha nidahas nawuka gamanagamanaya sahathika karalima udesa nirathuruwama kapawena bawaya. 2017 janawariye pawathi rayisina sanwadaye di japana niyojya widesha amathya shunsuke thakei mahatha awadharanaya kalak men, shri lankawa athulu indiya sagara kalapiya ratawal wenuwen japanaya saha indiyawa ekwa sahaya laba dime wada piliwela anuwa, shri lankawata suwisheshi sahayayak laba dime wada salasmak kriyathmaka kirimata sudanam bawa da me sakachchawe di awadharanaya kerini.
